channel.title: I cant open the client
channel.description:
i downloaded tokkulscape heres the and it wont let me rune the client it says
DanneScape 508 client! 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operal program or batch file press any key to continue...
please help its a 508 client and source

item.title: I cant open the client
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Download Java and set your environmental variables. There are guides for this in the tutorial section if you need them.

Also, post all batch file related questions/issues in the sticky.

Read full topic
